original_text: and I began to weep loudly because no one was found worthy to open the scroll or to look into it.
korean_text: 그 두루마리를 펴거나 보거나 하기에 합당한 자가 보이지 아니하기로 내가 크게 울었더니

sentences.original_text: and I began to weep loudly
because no one was found worthy
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 합당한 자를 찾지 못했기 때문입니다
